subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay raced to his first IndyCar win of the year after a slippery, crash-marred finish that left drivers upset the race was restarted in rain with about 10 laps left in Loudon, N.H.
snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay raced to his first IndyCar win of the year after a slippery, crash-marred finish that left drivers upset the race was restarted in rain with about 10 laps left in Loudon, N.H.
